title: Track Fault on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #JooKoon and #BoonLay are now running normally. Free bus and bus bridging services have ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #JooKoon and #BoonLay has resumed. Bus bridging are still available.
[EWL]: No train service between #JooKoon and #BoonLay in both directions. Free buses and bridging buses are available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Bus bridging are now available at affected stations between #BoonLay and #JooKoon.
[EWL]: Estimate 30 mins additional travelling time between #BoonLay and #JooKoon in both directions due to track fault.
